description:
Want to start using openstack? Come to this talk and meet shade! Shade
is a python library that wraps the many OpenStack clients.

This introductory talk presents:

-  an overview of openstack
-  connecting to openstack with shade
-  creating and listing machines, networks & co
-  shade usage in ansible modules
-  contributing to shade (tox, git review, …)
title: Just one Shade of OpenStack
